page.title: 18Mary Davies
page.content: Mrs. Mary Davies was born in 1595 at Shotwick. She was an extraordinary woman because when she was 28 she grew 3 big bumps behind her ears. When she was 40 years of age the bumps turned in to proper horns. every 4 years they fell out, and new, bigger ones grew in their place. She got married to a farmer and he protected her. Nobody knows where the horns are now because the were given to some relatives who thought they were Ram's horns and they threw them away. Another set were given to friends but were lost in a fire. In the end she died at an old age of 80 and was buried in London.
